trans-unit.source: Update Search Service
trans-unit.target: Update Search Service

trans-unit.source: Update Search Service (Azure Search Management REST API)
trans-unit.target: Update Search Service (Azure Search Management REST API)

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Update Service</languageKeyword> operation changes Search service configuration.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Update Service</languageKeyword> operation changes Search service configuration.

trans-unit.source: Valid changes include changing the tags, partition, or replica count, which adds or removes search units to your service as a billable event.
trans-unit.target: Valid changes include changing the tags, partition, or replica count, which adds or removes search units to your service as a billable event.

trans-unit.source: If you try to decrease partitions below the amount needed to store the existing search corpus, an error will occur, blocking the operation.
trans-unit.target: If you try to decrease partitions below the amount needed to store the existing search corpus, an error will occur, blocking the operation.

trans-unit.source: Changes to service topology can take a while.
trans-unit.target: Changes to service topology can take a while.

trans-unit.source: It takes time to relocate data, as well as setting up or tearing down clusters in the data center.
trans-unit.target: It takes time to relocate data, as well as setting up or tearing down clusters in the data center.

trans-unit.source: Note that you cannot change the <languageKeyword>name</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>location</languageKeyword>, or <languageKeyword>sku</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: Note that you cannot change the <languageKeyword>name</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>location</languageKeyword>, or <languageKeyword>sku</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: Changing any of these properties will require that you create a new service.
trans-unit.target: Changing any of these properties will require that you create a new service.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use PUT.
trans-unit.target: Alternatively, you can use PUT.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: HTTPS is required for all service requests.
trans-unit.target: HTTPS is required for all service requests.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Update Search Service</languageKeyword> request can be constructed using either a PATCH or PUT method.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Update Search Service</languageKeyword> request can be constructed using either a PATCH or PUT method.

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: Request Parameter
trans-unit.target: Request Parameter

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: The <codeInline>subscriptionID</codeInline> for the Azure user.
trans-unit.target: The <codeInline>subscriptionID</codeInline> for the Azure user.

trans-unit.source: You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
trans-unit.target: You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource group within the user’s subscription.
trans-unit.target: The name of the resource group within the user’s subscription.

trans-unit.source: You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
trans-unit.target: You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: The name of the search service within the specified resource group.
trans-unit.target: The name of the search service within the specified resource group.

trans-unit.source: The name of the search service within the specified resource group.
trans-unit.target: The name of the search service within the specified resource group.

trans-unit.source: If you don't know the service name, you can obtain a list using <link xlink:href="476d5360-2219-4b51-8e72-3cc6b08386ec" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Search Services (Azure Search API)</link>.
trans-unit.target: If you don't know the service name, you can obtain a list using <link xlink:href="476d5360-2219-4b51-8e72-3cc6b08386ec" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Search Services (Azure Search API)</link>.

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: The version of the protocol used for this request.
trans-unit.target: The version of the protocol used for this request.

trans-unit.source: The current version is <codeInline>2015-02-28</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: The current version is <codeInline>2015-02-28</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: The previous version, <codeInline>2014-07-31-Preview</codeInline>, is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: The previous version, <codeInline>2014-07-31-Preview</codeInline>, is deprecated.

trans-unit.source: Although it will continue to work for the next several months, we encourage you to transition to the current version as soon as possible.
trans-unit.target: Although it will continue to work for the next several months, we encourage you to transition to the current version as soon as possible.

trans-unit.source: Request Headers
trans-unit.target: Request Headers

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the required and optional request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the required and optional request headers.

trans-unit.source: Request Header
trans-unit.target: Request Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Set this to <codeInline>application/json</codeInline>
trans-unit.target: Set this to <codeInline>application/json</codeInline>

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: A client-generated GUID value that identifies this request.
trans-unit.target: A client-generated GUID value that identifies this request.

trans-unit.source: If specified, this will be included in response information as a way to map the request.
trans-unit.target: If specified, this will be included in response information as a way to map the request.

trans-unit.source: Request Body
trans-unit.target: Request Body

trans-unit.source: Request Body Parameters
trans-unit.target: Request Body Parameters

trans-unit.source: `<codeInline>tags</codeInline>: Optional.
trans-unit.target: `<codeInline>tags</codeInline>: Optional.

trans-unit.source: A list of key-value pairs that describe the resource.
trans-unit.target: A list of key-value pairs that describe the resource.

trans-unit.source: These tags can be used in viewing and grouping a resource across resource groups.
trans-unit.target: These tags can be used in viewing and grouping a resource across resource groups.

trans-unit.source: A maximum of 10 tags can be provided for a resource.
trans-unit.target: A maximum of 10 tags can be provided for a resource.

trans-unit.source: Each tag must have a key no greater than 128 characters and value no greater than 256 characters.
trans-unit.target: Each tag must have a key no greater than 128 characters and value no greater than 256 characters.

trans-unit.source: <codeInline>replicaCount</codeInline>: Optional.
trans-unit.target: <codeInline>replicaCount</codeInline>: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Default is 1.
trans-unit.target: Default is 1.

trans-unit.source: Valid values include 1 through 6.
trans-unit.target: Valid values include 1 through 6.

trans-unit.source: Valid only when the <codeInline>sku</codeInline> is <codeInline>standard</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: Valid only when the <codeInline>sku</codeInline> is <codeInline>standard</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: <codeInline>partitionCount</codeInline>: Optional.
trans-unit.target: <codeInline>partitionCount</codeInline>: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Default is 1.
trans-unit.target: Default is 1.

trans-unit.source: Valid values are 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, or 12.
trans-unit.target: Valid values are 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, or 12.

trans-unit.source: Valid only when the <codeInline>sku</codeInline> is <codeInline>standard</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: Valid only when the <codeInline>sku</codeInline> is <codeInline>standard</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.

trans-unit.source: Status Code
trans-unit.target: Status Code

trans-unit.source: HTTP 200 (OK) is returned if the operation is successful.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 200 (OK) is returned if the operation is successful.

trans-unit.source: You can use <languageKeyword>Get Search Service API </languageKeyword> to poll the status of the deleting service.
trans-unit.target: You can use <languageKeyword>Get Search Service API </languageKeyword> to poll the status of the deleting service.

trans-unit.source: We recommend polling intervals of 30 seconds to a minute.
trans-unit.target: We recommend polling intervals of 30 seconds to a minute.

trans-unit.source: Response Header
trans-unit.target: Response Header

trans-unit.source: The following headers are part of the response.
trans-unit.target: The following headers are part of the response.

trans-unit.source: Response Header
trans-unit.target: Response Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: This header is always set to application/json.
trans-unit.target: This header is always set to application/json.

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for the current operation generated by the service.
trans-unit.target: A unique identifier for the current operation generated by the service.

trans-unit.source: Response Body
trans-unit.target: Response Body

trans-unit.source: The response body contains the updated service definition.
trans-unit.target: The response body contains the updated service definition.

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <link xlink:href="8a58ac93-fc5c-486d-a204-8dd358ecba65" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Search Service (Azure Search API)</link>.
trans-unit.target: For an example, see <link xlink:href="8a58ac93-fc5c-486d-a204-8dd358ecba65" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Search Service (Azure Search API)</link>.
